#DayOutWithThomas

Facebook

Instagram

Event Information

‘Pop’ on board a train ride adventure with Thomas the Tank Engine! Day Out With Thomas: Bubble Tour is heading to heritage railways across the country with loads of bubble themed games and activities! Enjoy live entertainment, photo ops, the exclusive gift shop, lawn games and so much more. Take a real train ride with Thomas and spend the day creating memories for the whole family.

Continue to check the Upcoming 2024 Events list for tickets and locations as they are announced.

For questions about ticketing, please contact info@ticketweb.com

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

What is included with my ticket?

A ticket for Day Out With Thomas includes the train ride and photo op with a life-size Thomas the Tank Engine. Your ticket is also a site pass with access to visit all 4 main activity stations, lawn games, live entertainment, Day Out With Thomas pop-up gift shop with exclusive toys, photo op with Sir Topham Hatt, bubble-themed activities and more. Additional activities and museum access may vary per railroad location. Percy train ride tickets are an additional offering at select events. Ticket proceeds also support preserving the Great Historical Railroads!

Do I need a ticket to attend?

If you have celebrated your first birthday, a ticket is required to reserve your train ride time and access event activities. Under 1 is free, but must sit on the lap of a parent or guardian.

Do I need to purchase tickets in advance?

Purchasing tickets in advance is highly recommended as events tend to sell out.

How long is the train ride with Thomas?

Train ride lengths may vary between 20-45 minutes per location.

What if my event is cancelled or rescheduled?

If an event if cancelled, TicketWeb will contact customers with instructions regarding the refund process. If an event is rescheduled, you will receive an email from TicketWeb with your automatically rescheduled tickets on the new event date and time. If you are not able to attend the rescheduled date or time, please contact info@ticketweb.com regarding ticket changes or refunds.

For further questions about your Day Out With Thomas event, please contact your local railroad venue directly.
